attributes.action: Ban the import, fishing, purchase and sale of Shark/Shark Fins in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Fishermen will hack the fins off living sharks and simply throw the rest of their bodies overboard, allowing them to bleed to death. 

Sinking fin-less, slowly to the bottom of the sea.

Shark finning is a wasteful, barbaric practice, but it also has a devastating impact on our oceans.

The use of these atrocious practices in the name of archaic traditions and cultures, must stop. How are we to grow as a species if we continue to act like our poorly educated predecessors.

We have no excuse.
attributes.background:
According to many conservative estimates from multiple sources, 100,000,000 sharks are slaughtered for their fins every year. That’s roughly 274,000 sharks a day.

That's nearly double the population of the UK - Dying every year.

We need regulations now, to protect these species imperil.
